title: SMART PEOPLE PLEASE HALP MEH
body:
Thank you for clicking this, and thank you for trying, however successfully, to assist me in advance!

I recently have been forced to take a break from League (saddest face emoji) and it will probably last until the school year starts up again.
I was thinking about trying out a [Razer Sabertooth Controller](http://www.razerzone.com/gaming-controllers/razer-sabertooth) to play League. Yes, I know I'm gonna suck major tons of punctual kitten lice to start out with, and wut am I even thinking. But I do plan to practice on bots alot before I do anything drastic, because I do think I could get good at it 
(if I do it until Lvl 30, I'll have more Xp with the controller than with mouse and keyboard anyway)
So, for any people who have any insight into this whatsoever, can I please get some help/feedback?
Such as keybindings, or technical help

Thank you in advance again, here's a couple of boobies: {{champion:92}} {{champion:30}}

EDIT 1: And if you didn't check out the controller, it has 4 extra buttons, or 'paddles' on the back, just for clarification

replies.body: So I gotta ask: why would you want to use a controller over a KB/M? It's like handicapping yourself for no real reason.

Why not? I mean the point of this game is for fun, and I think a controller could be even better for some champs, like Yi or Akali, since they have no skill shots if I remember, but ultimately I just wanna do it because it seems cool and interesting.

A controller? For league?
I cannot think of any action more blasphemous, except maybe riot nerfing lee.
so no help from you either? PLEASE HALP MEH!
